branding.tagline: Understand how your users are engaging with your product or webpage with Looker's Block for Google Analytics 360

CONNECTION_NAME.label: Connection Name
CONNECTION_NAME.description: The connection that houses your GA360 data.

SCHEMA_NAME.label: Schema Name
SCHEMA_NAME.description: The schema name of your GA360.

GA360_TABLE_NAME.label: GA360 Table Name
GA360_TABLE_NAME.description: The table name of GA360 data. Note that you should include '_*' at the tail end of your input to account for all date partitioned tables.
